attributes.action: I would like there to be an independent inquiry into the Rotherham Rape Gangs.
attributes.additional_details: I believe there has not been an independent inquiry that focused specifically on this issue, and the generic blanket inquiry was insufficient, and barely mentioned this case at all.
attributes.background: I believe the Government (Whoever is in power) has a duty to not only ,the poor victims of these horrendous crimes, but also to the Citizens of the United Kingdom, to bring transparency and protect its Citizens who have the right to this information to protect their Children.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Launch a Public Inquiry into Grooming Gangs
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711976
